WorkItem.Description: ... to spell priority list as it adds a significant amount of spell power and is part of the rotation of most warlocks. It should not be ignored.

Comments.Message: search quite a bit now but can't find a duplicate issue. there are a few items related to Lifetap, but none of them requesting that "lifetap" is added to the spell priority list. As much as I can see the glyph of lifetap ( and its 20% win) is not taken into account in the fight.
